text: Abu Dhabi Authority for Culture & Heritage (ADACH) is a government agency of the United Arab Emirates, that takes care of the cultural heritage of the country. It was founded in 1981.Abu Dhabi Authority for Culture and Heritage, Abu Dhabi Classics. It is based in Abu Dhabi. It has a collection of photographs by Edward "Tug" Wilson. ==References== Category:1981 establishments in Asia Category:Government agencies Category:Cultural organizations Category:Organizations based in the United Arab Emirates
title: Abu Dhabi Authority for Culture & Heritage
